heading: ***A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR BENNINGTON COUNTY TODAY***Today
text: Morning light snow, a dusting to 2 inches, up to 4 inches in the southern Green Mountains, tapering off. Then mostly cloudy, some sunny breaks, with localized afternoon snow showers spreading east. Highs in the upper 20s to mid 30s. Winds becoming south to southeast 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph through the Champlain Valley, and over the higher terrain.

heading: Tonight
text: Localized evening snow showers or brief squalls, a dusting to an inch, tapering off. Mostly cloudy, with some partial clearing in the valleys and south. Lows in the teens to low 20s. Winds shifting to the southwest near 10 mph.

heading: Thursday
text: A mix of sun and clouds. Highs in the upper 20s and 30s. West winds near 10 mph.
